MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart, affecting properties in Craighlaw Mains Farm and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:16am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30am on  Friday, 25 December 2020
